name: StepWell
description: STEPWELL is a web3 style application with Social-Fi and Game-Fi elements that encourages its users to move and live a healthy life. Walk, run and train on jogging fields, on the field and at any distance you want with the NFT sneakers you equip yourself to win STW. iOS App on AppStore & Andorid APK on WebSite . Our goal with STEPWELL is to create a cleaner World. All you have to do for this goal is to have NFT shoes and walk with us. We can achieve this together.
